title: The Rise of Batteries in Six Charts
dot:
digraph{rankdir=TB;subgraph cluster_main{label="The Rise of Batteries";"Battery Sales Growth"->"Cost & Quality"->"Domino Effect"->"Modelers' Underestimation"->"Future Drivers"->"Fossil Fuel Phase - out";"Battery Sales Growth"[label="Exponential growth (S - curves)
Doubling every 2 - 3 years"];"Cost & Quality"[label="Cost falling (99% in 30 years)
Quality rising (energy density)
Cost ↓ with more deployment
Quality ↑ with more deployment"];"Domino Effect"[label="One market going battery - electric tips the next
Consumer electronics -> 2/3 - wheelers -> cars -> trucks -> storage -> shipping/aviation"];"Modelers' Underestimation"[label="Analysts miss exponential growth
Actual sales outrun forecasts"];"Future Drivers"[label="Costs ↓, policy support ↑, competition ↑
Barriers exist but adoption will be fast"];"Fossil Fuel Phase - out"[label="Displace 86 EJ in road transport
Put 23 EJ at risk in shipping/aviation
Reduce 175 EJ in electricity sector"];}}
